traits.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Beaks
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6 damage) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
